assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Tafamidis_Initial_Exclusion_Criteria_Q1
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: Do any of the following exclusion criteria apply? The patient has received either one of the following: a. Heart or liver transplant b. An Implanted Cardiac Mechanical Assist Device (CMAD) c. Drug supplied through enrollment in the extension trial (Expanded Access Program â€“ EAP) of the ATTR-ACT Phase III Study
